name: elmish-todo
description: To Do app from Elmish Book
author: mardukbp

scripts.clean-dev-mac: sudo killall -9 node && sudo killall -9 dotnet && sudo killall -9 elmish-todo
scripts.clean-dev-win: taskkill /f /im node.exe && taskkill /f /im dotnet.exe && taskkill /f /im elmish-todo.exe
scripts.compile: dotnet fable src/Main && dotnet fable src/Renderer
scripts.dev: dotnet fable watch src/Main --run npm run devrenderer
scripts.devmain: dotnet fable watch src/Main --run npm run webpackdev
scripts.devrenderer: dotnet fable watch src/Renderer --run npm run webpackdev
scripts.dist: npm run compile && npm run webpack &&  electron-builder
